localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
blogPost.body: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
blogPost.title: Pickle - Transcribe and analyze phone and video conversations
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Pickle帮助企业了解他们与客户的每一次电话和视频对话。我们通过自动转录电话并提取关键见解、问题和趋势来实现这一目标。
localize.tagline: 抄录和分析电话和视频对话。

localize.description: Pickle幫助企業瞭解他們與客戶的每一次電話和視頻對話。我們通過自動轉錄電話並提取關鍵見解、問題和趨勢來實現這一目標。
localize.tagline: 抄錄和分析電話和視頻對話。

previous.excerpt: Threadletter allows converting a Revue newsletter to a Twitter thread in seconds. Enter the Revue API key, select the issue, and publish the thread via Chirr App or copy-paste to Twitter.
previous.title: Threadletter - Convert Revue newsletter to Twitter thread in seconds

localize.description: Threadletter允许在几秒钟内将Revue通讯转换为Twitter主题。输入Revue的API密钥，选择问题，并通过Chirr App或复制粘贴到Twitter发布线程。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将Revue通讯转换为Twitter线程

localize.description: Threadletter允許在幾秒鐘內將Revue通訊轉換爲Twitter主題。輸入Revue的API密鑰，選擇問題，並通過Chirr App或複製粘貼到Twitter發佈線程。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將Revue通訊轉換爲Twitter線程

next.title: Pudding.ai - Real-time feedback for your ad creatives

localize.description: 使用https://pudding.ai/，進行實時廣告創意分析，以最大限度地提高您的廣告活動投資回報率和工作效率。爲您的所有廣告創意獲取可操作的、數據驅動的AI洞察力💡，並通過確保您的創意和媒體團隊之間的巨大溝通來彌補差距。
